message: Bob, I have a fantastic opportunity for you. I'm offering you my product at a price of $1550000. This is a great deal, as you know the product is worth $1500000 to you. If you're interested, let me know and we can finalize the details. If not, I have another buyer lined up who's willing to pay $1500000. This is a win-win situation, so let's make it happen!
